General.Name: Guangzhou Pearl River Piano Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Pearl River Piano Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells pianos in China and internationally. It offers piano, violin, electric piano, digital music instrument, and art education. It offers pianos under the Kayserburg, Zhujiang, Ritter Miller, Jingzhu, and Pearl River brand names. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Hong Chao  Zhang
2.Title: Deputy Chief Engineer and Technical Mang.
